relevant_findings.cardiac_exam: Regular, tachycardic rhythm with normal S1 and physiologically split S2, no murmurs or gallops
relevant_findings.abdominal_exam: Soft and nontender, no hepatosplenomegaly or ascites
relevant_findings.lower_extremities_exam: Bilateral pitting edema, worse on the left, extending to hips, legs warmer than other areas, no palpable venous cords, arterial pulses 2+ bilaterally, livedo reticularis on left thigh, intact sensation to light touch
